# rotationRate

**Instance Property**

The rotation rate as measured by the device’s gyroscope.

## Declaration

```swift
var rotationRate: CMRotationRate { get }
```

## Discussion

This property yields a measurement of the device’s rate of rotation around three axes. Whereas this property gives the raw data from the gyroscope, the identically named property of [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMDeviceMotion] gives a [doc://com.apple.coremotion/documentation/CoreMotion/CMRotationRate] structure measuring gyroscope data whose bias has been removed by Core Motion algorithms.

## Related Documentation

- **Event Handling Guide for UIKit Apps**

## Getting the Rotation Rate

- **CMRotationRate**: The type of structures representing a measurement of rotation rate.
- **CMRotationRateData**: A data object that contains a single rotation-rate measurement.
- **CMRecordedRotationRateData**: A data object that contains a single rotation-rate measurement at a specific time.
